ds_id: Wellington Shields & Co. LLC Sells 2999 Shares of Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)@Defense World@2023-06-15 18:54:34.514348@Apple
data_content: Wellington Shields & Co. has reduced its holdings in Apple stock by 2.7% in the fourth quarter, selling off 2,999 shares. Apple remains the third-largest position in the investor's portfolio. A number of firms, including Harbour Investments, Silverlake Wealth Management, Live Oak Investment Partners, Gateway Wealth Partners and Beacon Financial Planning, have recently added to or reduced their stakes in the technology giant. Apple demonstrated a year-over-year decline in Q4 2016-17 revenues, however, the company still dominates the industry, according to research firm IDC.
